code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const addPage=_ref=>{let{handleAddFriend,setShowmain}=_ref;const[friendUID,setFriendUID]=useState();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();handleAddFriend(friendUID);setFriendUID(friendUID);setShowmain(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:'red'},className:"addpage-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add a Friend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"friendUID",name:"friendUID",value:friendUID,onChange:e=>setFriendUID(Number(e.target.value)),placeholder:"Enter friend's UID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",id:"addFriendButton",name:"addFriendButton",children:"Add Friend"})]})]});};export default addPage;
